title: Panthères Noires
text:
Panthères Noires Kigali was a <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> club from <a href="Kigali">Kigali</a> in <a href="Rwanda">Rwanda</a>.
In 1980 the team has won the <a href="Rwandan%20Premier%20League">Rwandan Premier League</a>.
Stadium.
The team plays at the <a href="Stade%20Regional%20de%20Kigali">Stade Regional de Kigali</a>.
